short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yahoo Sports extension for displaying real-time game scores for all the top leagues, NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA and more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yahoo Sports is the industry leader for all the latest Sports News, Scores, and Fantasy Games. This extension give's you the latest scores for top Sports leagues on your desktop at the click of a button.
